application.controllers

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.controllers.MainController
      • application.controllers.LoginController

  • public class LoginController
extends MainController
    Purpose:
    Control logging in to the program, and for setting up
    a User and their environment
    Description:
    Checks the user's username and password (via the Login view) and
    enables creation of Customer's (via the Registration view).
    Sends the User to the appropriate Dashboard (that for the Customer
    or that for the Employee) when they log in.
    Version:
    $Date: 2017/12/14 16:00:00 $
    Author:
    Zaid Al Lahham and Aleksi Anttila
